item.title: Mastering Python With Boot.dev and Codewars
item.description: Python: To-go Programming Language Recently i started to learn the Python programming language. You might say:“Ah, shit! Here we go again.”, but listen! Yes, it is annoying that everyone and everybody screams and yells that it is slow and unflexible language… but! It’s still the best language for the beginners. Some of my friends recommended me to start with C, because it’s the primary language for CS, and i tried to learn it… But, unfortunately i quit.

item.title: Setting Up Game Maker Studio in Linux
item.description: Requirements If you also act first and then think, this short guide will help you figure out a couple problems when trying to launch a game in GameMaker Studio, namely this error: linuxdeploy And besides this error, there may be an error with: Steam Runtime AppImage These errors are caused by these non-installed tools. So lets fix it! Tools For Building The AppImage Packages All versions of GameMaker starting with the 2022.
